website_summaries.verdict: This set is a good choice for novices to the LEGO Speed Champion series and for anyone looking for a creative toy on a budget.
pros: Includes LEGO pieces needed to built the classic 1968 Mustang
Has nice attention to details – even adults brag about the authentic looks
Comes with a minifigure and race timing board
cons: The instructions could be better, but fortunately it's not very difficult to build

customer_reviews.title: I Miss My Mustang.
customer_reviews.text: In high school, my step-dad and bought an old junker that just happened to be this same car, even the same color...or would have been if we'd finished. It was a 1968 Mustang Fastback GT 390...marvelous machine, marvelous. Unfortunately, we did a lot of work on it, college came, and it somehow got sold. But this little model makes me feel like I'm back working on that car. Maybe someday I'll annoy my wife and by another to go with my Lego model!
customer_reviews.author: MRN Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift for Ford Mustang fans
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a Ford Mustang fan. She loved it! Said she put together and then took it apart to put it together again. Left off the stickers though and she said it was better that way. Loved how the bricks where custom made to resemble the real thing. Only down side was box came banged up from shipping. Else, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gag gift for my husband who ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gag gift for my husband who is the definition of mustang lover. Told him I wanted to support his addiction and buy him a mustang he could build with the kids. He was impressed with all it came with.
customer_reviews.author: MommaH

customer_reviews.title: These little cars were like the old days of building model cars
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son is a huge lego fan and I was looking for something a little different than the normal buildings and Star Wars legos that he has so many of. These little cars were like the old days of building model cars. So perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jen C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun to build.
customer_reviews.text: Built it to put on my desk. I glued it together so it won't end up with missing parts. It actually took a little while to put together as it has over 180 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Stray Cat

customer_reviews.title: Its Lego! You have to love it.
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about Lego! They are great. This arrived as expected and in perfect condition. My 7year old put together right away. He loved it. Great little car!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Cool Lego Set
customer_reviews.text: Super cool lego set for the muscle car loving kid! My seven year old was able to build it on his own. He loves it & has it on display. Hope to find and buy more sets like this one.
customer_reviews.author: MrStandup

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego car set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who loves cars, Legos, owns a mustang and works in a machine shop. He really liked how much thought went into the building of these Legos to make this particular mustang body. He had nothing but good things to say about it when he was finished assembling it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: My nephew is going to love this
customer_reviews.text: In fact, he's going to have all the boys and girls chasing him while he's showing off his fastback mustang at school. He's going to be the most popular kid, end up a high school quarterback, prom king, and ultimately land a great job with a large company. When you have a fastback mustang, the life possibilities are endless.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: I wish this wasn't setup as a race car and ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish this wasn't setup as a race car and was left as the classic "Bullitt" Mustang it reminds everyone of. I left all stickers off and have it as my Commissioner Gordon's cop car.
customer_reviews.author: MaTTK

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of room for Lego's but I enjoy putting them together. This is good value for the money since it takes up little space and is still fun to build.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO Option
customer_reviews.text: As with any Legos, instructions were clear for our son to follow and he loved assembling the car. He’s 7 and found it to be challenging but still possible to assemble. He asked for more like this and we prefer them as the vehicles can be played with after assembled (some other sets we’re not sure what to do with once assembled 😬)
customer_reviews.author: Jerusha Norviel

customer_reviews.title: Fast build for 5 and up
customer_reviews.text: Great build for any Ford Mustang fan. Comes with one minifig. Easy for anyone 5 and up - only hassle is some decals are installed pre-build so can be tricky to apply in correct orientation for the location on car. But decals don't have to be applied at all if you'd rather have a clean look. Great build for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Packers fan in Hoosierland

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy building this Lego’s Mustang - fun and relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: It was so fun building this car! I built it without the decals except for the mustang one. When I was building it, I could visualize the car chase on the San Francisco’s hilly streets in the 1968 Bullitt’s movie.
customer_reviews.author: TIGER2

customer_reviews.title: Dealing with a quality company!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing not to like. Pieces fit together perfectly and resulted in a neat end product, a class car. The decals were easy to apply and the car looked just like the illustration on the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gearhead toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 8 year old gearhead grandson, he absolutely had fun building it and it sturdy enough for play and does not fall apart. The wheels turn easily so it’s fun to p,ay with too
customer_reviews.author: Ashwil

customer_reviews.title: Legotastic
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my mustang loving son. He was able to combine his love for mustangs and legos. He was so excited and happy when he opened this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Love this series in LEGO. These are really well thought out and they are not an impossible long process to build. My 8 year old did this by himself.
customer_reviews.author: John Yeaman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a 11 year old
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to love. Super car and LEGOs together. We love forza And my so. Loved these.
customer_reviews.author: jamie j

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Son has fun with legos so this is a perfect fit for his lego collection

customer_reviews.title: Speed Champions are very detailed
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at how precise Lego is able to make their smaller speed champions. I'm a fan of Lego, so I just buy anything.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher McCune

customer_reviews.title: They are legos!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love legos so any new lego is a good lego!
customer_reviews.author: B Ryan Like the Bird

customer_reviews.title: Son was happy
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this. It was however missing one piece. Thankfully it was just a decorative part of the tire.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, looks cool
customer_reviews.text: Was fun to put together. Bought for my desk at work.
customer_reviews.author: sk00t3r

customer_reviews.title: Fun build
customer_reviews.text: Unique build. This series of speed cars are all different. Please come out with alternate colors of the same car.
customer_reviews.author: WonderZ

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Great concept. Fairly detailed as a model yet cheap enough to be a toy. Home run LEGO.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Model
customer_reviews.text: The 1968 Ford Mustang Fastback is a true icon of American Muscle Cars and Lego created a great model based on that classic design. It's just challenging enough to be satisfying and looks great along with my other LEGO Speed Champions sets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set, but LEGO boxes always destroyed when shipped by Amazon. 😒
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome LEGO set, but I'm learning not to order LEGO from Amazon. The boxes are always crushed, which is unacceptable for collectors or to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: SVP

customer_reviews.title: Boys loved
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loved it its a little more for 5 or 6 yr old but still a good build

customer_reviews.title: Really?
customer_reviews.text: Lego + Mustang. How could you possibly go wrong? ?? Honestly people

customer_reviews.title: realy good set
customer_reviews.text: really nice small set for that 6 year old or a quick gift

customer_reviews.title: Fun, detailed build
customer_reviews.text: Fun build and I really enjoy seeing the details of the original car come out even in such a small version.

customer_reviews.title: Buy buy awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this car he sat at the table and built this car amazing.

customer_reviews.title: Fun little kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great product fun build to do with my little brother got it form for Christmas he loved it

customer_reviews.title: Great mustang detail
customer_reviews.text: Great detail. Not a sticker fan so built and left them off. Wish I had a couple of black pieces to replace the white pieces on door area.
customer_reviews.author: tpmmem

customer_reviews.title: Favorite American Sports Car in Lego form!
customer_reviews.text: Fun small scale lego build and loved every moment of it

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the pictures and I am very happy with it

customer_reviews.title: Kid loved it
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the set. A must have for Lego fans!! Looks great on display.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this car kit for my 11 year old grandson and he absolutely loved building it.

customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my son. He loved putting it together and adding it to his Lego collection.

customer_reviews.text: great priced compared to sets at walmart. Son loved this

customer_reviews.title: Amazon packaging tries to ruin a good product
customer_reviews.text: For $12 this is pretty good value for 2018. Amazon tried their best to ruin this product, first picture is how everything looked opening the top of the amazon package. If you want an undamaged LEGO box order somewhere else other than Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this item. He enjoyed the challenge of putting it together.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged LEGO Box
customer_reviews.text: LEGO iitself is fine but the box it is in is heavily damaged. The item was purchased as a gift to be given to someone who also keeps the boxes with the LEGO. Bummer. 3 stars given for how package arrived.

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Sent to our son as a gift he loves it

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift to my boyfriend and he loved putting it together! All the small details are really neat. Would not recommend for small children because of the teeny tiny parts.

customer_reviews.text: This little car is awsome and was fun to pute together and will be on my shelf for years and possibly even decades.

product_meta.title: LEGO Speed Champions 1968 Ford Mustang Fastback 75884 Building Kit (183 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Create a buildable LEGO version of a classic American muscle car—the LEGO Speed Champions 75884 1968 Ford Mustang Fastback. Ideal for display or racing, it features a minifigure cockpit, removable windshield, wheels with rubber tires and gold-colored rims, and authentic design details. This building set includes a minifigure and buildable ‘timing’ board to play out race scenarios.
feature_bullets: Build the 1968 Ford Mustang Fastback classic muscle car, featuring a minifigure cockpit with removable windshield and authentic design details!
Includes a classic Ford race car driver minifigure with a helmet, plus a buildable ‘timing’ board with digital display

1968 green, black and gold Ford Mustang Fastback toy car measures over 1-inch (5cm) high, 5-inch (14cm) long and 2-inch (6cm) wide ‘Timing’ board measures over 2-inch (6cm) high, 1-inch (4cm) wide and under 1-inch (1cm) deep
183 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 7 and 14
LEGO Speed Champions model car kits are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars615 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
